reviews.review_msg: Great class! Super knowledgeable, fair grader and provides great feedback on assignments. Uses easy to grasp examples when explaining tricky concepts. You can tell he cares a lot about his students and really wants them to succeed!

If you ever have the chance to take a class with Linden as a TA, do it. You will learn so much as he is such a good teacher and really cares about his students. A great person and teacher. Very organized.

Linden was an awesome anatomy TA. He's super knowledgeable and more than willing to help. He takes the time to explain everything very well and you can tell he really cares about the students! He made anatomy a great experience! I would highly recommend him as a TA if you can!

Linden is an excellent TA. He's extremely accessible outside of class and truly wants to see his students succeed. He knows an alarming amount of anatomy and is very good at explaining stuff. Highly recommend him as a TA- you will learn a lot and have fun (Exams are tough but fair though so definitely prepare).
